entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 8 except plus 5 along parts of the coast.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016
